veo_text_prompt: Create a 15-second vertical Onam promo for ‘Pallath Height’ with a high-energy 140 BPM chenda melam groove. Scene 1 (0–3s): Overhead time-lapse pookkalam forms on ivory; petals swirl on first downbeat; English title ‘Pallath Height Onam Celebration’. Scene 2 (3–6s): Hyper-detailed chenda close-ups with percussive flash on downbeats; English caption ‘Chenda Melam • Live’. Scene 3 (6–9s): Tug of War—backlit silhouettes, golden dust, rope center frame; NO on-screen text. Scene 4 (9–12s): Majestic bulky Maveli waves amid floating petals; English title ‘Heartfelt Onam Wishes’. End card (12–15s): English details and CTA; include QR placeholder. All on-screen text must be ENGLISH ONLY. Add Malayalam voiceover stating the organizer and date/time: ‘Pallath Height is conducting the Onam celebration’ and ‘29 August 2025, Friday, from morning onwards.’ Keep cultural authenticity (no western drum kits). Cinematic warm grade, kasavu gold accents, petal particles reacting subtly to the beat.
